item.title: Upgrade Nas4Free from 9.3.0.2 to 10.2.0.2
item.description: I upgraded my nas machine which is based on nas4free this wednesday. Everything went smooth. I made a backup of my current configuration. I uploaded the new 10.2.0.2.2332 image and after some minutes my server reboots automatically. After this I was able to login. The upgrade procedure described to restore my previous configuration. But this failed. The browser showed me the error XML error: Not well-formed (invalid token) at line 1.
